infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to analyze the patient and guide you through emergency procedures.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access to hear your voice commands.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs your location to share with emergency services.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: This app needs speech recognition to understand your voice commands.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow EmergencyAR to access your camera to analyze the patient.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow EmergencyAR to use your location to share with emergency services.

Allow EmergencyAR to use the microphone for voice commands.
plugins.speechRecognitionPermission: Allow EmergencyAR to use speech recognition.
